Text: Big Thanks for sharing BBC Hardtalk Series, TV Sucks where I live, keep it flowing good man!

Thanks for showing your appreciation PauFitl2008. I hope I will be able to maintain these uploads, but if not more people will be seeding their downloads up to a reasonable ratio and for longer periods of time I doubt I will be able to keep it up in the long run. I hope I can, but I can't promise anything.
